data_descriptor.name: work
data_descriptor.description: Participant was at work (including temporary and permanent work locations away from home). 1=Yes, 0=No

data_descriptor.name: indoor
data_descriptor.description: Participant was in indoor space: non-home, non-work (store, resturant, gym, waiting room etc.). 1=Yes, 0=No

data_descriptor.name: outdoor
data_descriptor.description: Participant was outdoor: non-home, non-work (park, playground, garden, sidewalk, etc.). 1=Yes, 0=No

data_descriptor.name: vehicle
data_descriptor.description: Participant was in vehicle (car, bus, subway, train, bike, etc.). 1=Yes, 0=No

input_parameters.window_size: 10 minutes prior starting qualtrics context survey

algorithm.description: This algorithm analyze 10 minutes (prior to participant starts filling context survey) to label window whether participant was interacting or not.
